text: Uye (rangarirai) apo Musa paakakumbirira vanhu vake mvura yekunwa, tikati: “Rova dombo netsvimbo yako” pakabva pabuda zvisipiti gumi nezviviri mariri. Boka roga roga revanhu rikaziva nzvimbo yaro yekunwira mvura. “Idyai nekunwa kubva kune chokudya chinobva kuna Allah, uye zvirokwazvo, musava munoita zvisakarurama panyika.”
